Plot: Maggie Peyton, the new owner of Number 53 - the free-wheelin' Volkswagen bug with a mind of its own - puts the car through its paces on the road to becoming a NASCAR competitor.
Title: Herbie Fully Loaded
Writer: Thomas Lennon (screenplay), Robert Ben Garant (screenplay), Alfred Gough (screenplay), Miles Millar (screenplay), Thomas Lennon (story), Robert Ben Garant (story), Mark Perez (story), Gordon Buford (characters)
Actors: Lindsay Lohan, Michael Keaton, Matt Dillon, Breckin Meyer
